thread.title: SNP Schneider Neureither & Partner resolves employee participation programme
thread.title_full: BRIEF-SNP Schneider Neureither & Partner resolves employee participation programme | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: SNP Schneider Neureither & Partner resolves employee participation programme
text:
Sept 28 SNP Schneider Neureither & Partner AG :
* Has resolved an employee participation programme in form of a shareholding bonus
* Is to pay SNP Group employees a "shareholding premium" of 1.40 euros for each SNP share acquired on or after Oct. 1 and held for at least twelve months Source text for Eikon: (Gdynia Newsroom)
